# Other tools {#htmltools-other-tools}

## CSS
- See [cascadess](https://github.com/nteetor/cascadess) to customize the style of tags

```{r, eval = FALSE}
ui <- list(
  cascadess(),
  h4(
    .style %>%
      font(case = "upper") %>%
      border(bottom = "red"),
    "Etiam vel tortor sodales tellus ultricies commodo."
  )
)
```
